thread.title: Rae Sremmurd Will Join The Weeknd for Legends of the Fall Tour in North America
thread.title_full: Rae Sremmurd Will Join The Weeknd for Legends of the Fall Tour in North America

author: Carl Lamarre
title: Rae Sremmurd Will Join The Weeknd for Legends of the Fall Tour in North America
text:
COMMENTS Tim Mosenfelder/Getty Images Swae Lee and Slim Jimmy of Rae Sremmurd perform during the Dim Mak 20th Anniversary Tour at the Bill Graham Civic Auditorium on Nov. 18, 2016 in San Francisco, Calif. 
This April, Rae Sremmurd will join The Weeknd on the North American leg of his Legend of the Fall Tour. Previously announced acts include Roc Nation rapper Belly and rising R&B star 6LACK . 
The U.S. trek will begin April 25 in Vancouver, CA, and wrap on June 9 in Cincinnati, OH. After securing their first Hot 100 No. 1 with "Black Beatles" late last year, Rae Sremmurd has continued to drop visuals, like their latest golf course party in " Swang ." 
As for The Weeknd, the Canadian crooner began his world tour in Stockholm, Sweden on Friday (Feb. 17). While making pit stops in European cities, The Weeknd will also perform in South America, as well. For the duration of the tour's dates in Europe, he will be accompanied by Lil Uzi Vert and Bryson Tiller . 
Last week, the XO leader released his star-studded video "Reminder," which featured cameos from from Drake, Travis Scott, and A$AP Rocky. 
Take a look at The Weeknd's dates for his North American tour below. A post shared by The Weeknd (@theweeknd) on Feb 20, 2017 at 3:06pm PST
